attributes.action: Abandon the proposed Manchester road charging scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The proposed Manchester road charing scheme as laid out in the document "Our Future Transport" appears to be a thinly veiled scheme to increase the tax burden on motorists and will severly inhibit Manchesters future growth.

Why is the "outer" zone more expensive to enter than the "inner" zone, where congestion is highest?

Why are all of the proposed improvements to public transport inside the zones of future charging schmes?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
